abstract: China is stepping up attempts to hamper BHP Billiton’s $39 billion hostile offer for Potash Corp., amid worries about future supplies of fertilizer it needs to rapidly boost food production.
snippet: China is stepping up attempts to hamper BHP Billiton’s $39 billion hostile offer for Potash Corp., amid worries about future supplies of fertilizer it needs to rapidly boost food production.
lead_paragraph: China is stepping up attempts to hamper BHP Billiton‘s $39 billion hostile offer for Potash Corp., amid worries about future supplies of fertilizer it needs to rapidly boost food production.

headline.main: China Digs for Ways to Stymie BHP’s Potash Bid
